follow-up to this message
https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/238009-t-compiler.2Fmeetings/topic/.5Bweekly.5D.202021-07-22.20.2354818/near/246851576

Joshua Nelson suggested to include also the last comment in a zulip topic tracking discussions for MCP (to have a more complete view of what's happening)

I'll investigate Zulip APIs on how to do that, I think what is needed is:

  • get the first bot comment in the github issue for that MCP, that comment should have the link to the Zulip topic
  • regexp my way out through that comment and extract the Zulip topic ID
  • query that Zulip topic and get the last message timestamp
the zulip topic is maintained by the bot, I think so it should be available (there's a function or something)
this seems related to the "rustbot note" that I've been proposing
I would like people to be able to 'log' important points
